column1: Traffic reports will resume Monday July 29 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT DUE TO RUPTURED WATER MAIN:
column4: Inbound Leestown Rd is shut down just prior to New Circle Rd.  Traffic diverted to the outer loop.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT DUE TO RUPTURED WATER MAIN:
column4: The exit ramp from the inner loop of New Circle Rd to Leestown Rd is also shut down.
